channel.title: Help: Port Forwarding
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Need Help Port Forwarding[/b][/u][/center] [center]Hello :) I am making a server called "JkpScape" "||||||||||" 50% finished... I have set up the No-Ip DUC, so i only need help for the Port Forwarding. Can any1 help me whit that, i have read all the Tuts ppls tel about the port but i didn't get any help of that... I am using Belkin as modem so u now that...[/center] [left] [ul][li]Server Features[/li] [li]Based: LollyScape TuT island: If u do it, it will have full dragon waiting for u at the end[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Server Commands[/li] [li]::barrows - Used for wearing or selling[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]::dragon - Selling or wearing[/li] [li]And more[/li][/ul] [/left]
[center]Server Glitches[/center]
[center]The server doesn't have fully working thieving, agility and slayer We are working at it, so please do not comment :) It might be more so plz tell it to me at homepage under ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D[center]
[center] :DRulez:D[center]
Do not ask to be a Pm(player mod) Mo(Moderator)
Read ::rules
Are locking for moderators, that can code java and more.
Owner: Jkp Admin: Jkp
Moderators: No1 yet...
PlayerM: Martin, Gannondorf
Jkp
:DPictures:D
No pictures :( :( :( :( :(
adding more soon

item.title: Help: Port Forwarding

item.description:
@Jkp wrote:

Well…

I have got there but i have belkin and i am new…
should i press “Viritual srerver” From the menu…?

Read full topic

item.title: Help: Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @dream89 dream89
item.description:
@dream89 wrote:

ok this is what u need to do go to ur internet connection box find out ur ip then put it in address box then log into server and from thier port forward. I can’t get into my router since i don’t know pass cause my parents changed it -.-

Read full topic

@Jkp wrote:

[center]Need Help Port Forwarding[/center]
[center]Hello I am making a server called “JkpScape” “||||||||||” 50% finished…
I have set up the No-Ip DUC, so i only need help for the Port Forwarding.
Can any1 help me whit that, i have read all the Tuts ppls tel about the port but i didn’t get any help
of that… I am using Belkin as modem so u now that…[/center]
